text:
Reinhard Tritscher (August 5, 1946 – September 20, 2018) was an Austrian alpine skier. He competed in the 1972 Winter Olympics where he finished 8th in the Giant Slalom. He was born in Ramsau am Dachstein.
Tritscher was killed in a climbing accident on September 20, 2018 at the Hoher Dachstein at the age of 72.
